alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson and Madison Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Suwannee River State Park to 13 miles south of Monticello. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Madison, Greenville, Lee, Alma, Ebb, Lamont, Hamburg, Eridu, Nash, Thomas City, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Hanson, Wacissa Springs, Sirmans, Lake Miccosukee and Moseley Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
